title: George055
author: George055
content: I was just heard that an upcoming DingDang bubble project is launching it's Future Trading bot available on Discord and Telegram, you have the capability to go long or short on any on-chain assets as Futures trading is all about betting against the pricing, this is why Bubble Futures Bot will use Chain Link price oracle on Ethereum Chain to fetch real-time prices from centralized and decentralized trading platforms.So i also heard about other bots like unibot following the same practice and people are taking good profit from them so i want to ask from some experts should i have to take part in the ding dang project and used their bot for trading because projects like this are always gives profit according to my DYOR.website link are given belowWeb: https://dingdang.io/

comments.author: Questat
comments.body: Quote from: George055 on September 10, 2023, 10:41:41 AMI was just heard that an upcoming DingDang bubble project is launching it's Future Trading bot available on Discord and Telegram, you have the capability to go long or short on any on-chain assets as Futures trading is all about betting against the pricing, this is why Bubble Futures Bot will use Chain Link price oracle on Ethereum Chain to fetch real-time prices from centralized and decentralized trading platforms.So i also heard about other bots like unibot following the same practice and people are taking good profit from them so i want to ask from some experts should i have to take part in the ding dang project and used their bot for trading because projects like this are always gives profit according to my DYOR.website link are given belowWeb: https://dingdang.io/Tried not to believe those people who were talking good about them and saying "always gives profit" because that was impossible. Although I'm not an expert in trading but with my long experience in trading, I could say that losses are inevitable, and never seen any platform that would beat the market volatility. Yes, because no matter what we do, we can't make all things right which is why losses are possible even though you are an expert. Trading gives you no assurance and how much more these bots which is also reliant on the user.

comments.author: Bananington
comments.body: Quote from: Questat on September 10, 2023, 12:06:59 PMTried not to believe those people who were talking good about them and saying "always gives profit" because that was impossible. Most times the people who talk good the most about trading bots are often part of the team that own it. People will pay to use these bots, getting people to pay to use these bots is part of the profit generating process. I advise you do not give too much believe to bots even though some may work for a while. If you want to be a good trader, you have to develop the skill you have and try to become more efficient. That is one way to stay long in the market.

comments.author: fmz89
comments.body: bot crypto trading is been while from 2014 as i remember, 2015 began to take of in some user. at that point only for cex, while dex isnot exist yetusing bot for asistant is good, for dex seems only small of people manage to build the bot who enjoy the profit. is really great risk using auto trade bot.i'm just saying good for trade asistant

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: Quote from: George055 on September 10, 2023, 10:41:41 AMI was just heard that an upcoming DingDang bubble project is launching it's Future Trading bot available on Discord and Telegram, you have the capability to go long or short on any on-chain assets as Futures trading is all about betting against the pricing, this is why Bubble Futures Bot will use Chain Link price oracle on Ethereum Chain to fetch real-time prices from centralized and decentralized trading platforms.So i also heard about other bots like unibot following the same practice and people are taking good profit from them so i want to ask from some experts should i have to take part in the ding dang project and used their bot for trading because projects like this are always gives profit according to my DYOR.website link are given belowWeb: https://dingdang.io/Who knows if is not the same user controlling the both accounts from my records, your account was created since last 2 year ago and have never come online how come you suddenly come online to make a post about dingdang.io and why have you chosen to come here today to post about this project after 2 years of inactive in the forum, not just inactive but has not made any post since its creations and had just come online to make post today, same day dingdang.io made their post.Does anyone cares to look into this whole drama? Yes I got this notification from the bot and I did reply on that post but didn't find anything interesting in that thread but come here again to see that this user who made account long ago also come online to post this same project, he focused was to promote this so called site. Be warned as I smells something phishing here.

comments.author: o48o
comments.body: You guys are trying to advertise this scam again? You just changed the text on the page. Now it says it WILL be listed to 20+ exchanges. Last time it read that it was currently available in 20+ exchanges, even though it wasn't. Was that such an obvious scam that you decided to tune your lying down? And one of the partners is still binance, which is a lie too. What ever you do people, do not connect your wallet for an airdrop or buy this! It's such an obvious scam i don't feel i should be explaining how.This was earlier shill attempt with other account: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5466111.msg62816270#msg62816270

comments.author: Ndabagi01
comments.body: Projects like these always benefit a few people who are presumably linked with them while harming the bulk of people who are unrelated to the project. I'm sure you're aware of how devious the bitcoin market is, as well as the fact that every loss is irreversible. Consider this before joining into a project you've never heard of or wish to join based on your research of similar former projects in the market.

comments.author: goaldigger
comments.body: Quote from: Ndabagi01 on September 10, 2023, 09:40:59 PMProjects like these always benefit a few people who are presumably linked with them while harming the bulk of people who are unrelated to the project. I'm sure you're aware of how devious the bitcoin market is, as well as the fact that every loss is irreversible. Consider this before joining into a project you've never heard of or wish to join based on your research of similar former projects in the market. That’s true, only those on top can benefit from this and if there’s a fee for this, I’d rather not to grab it.This is not new, many trading bot or trading signal are being offered in Telegram or any platform, again if you want to have a more safe trading experience better to trade on your own and analyze on your own. Also, if you are planning to use trading bot, then better to go to the best option available in the market.

comments.author: jossiel
comments.body: People don't have to answer him, he's made new account just to advertise that bot.I have no idea what's with that bot but it is for sure that it shouldn't be trusted because you'll never know if that bot has got something inside it and not worth it at all.

comments.author: gurunanakji777
comments.body: I generally don't trust hearsay, and until you use it yourself, you won't really know the truth. We all know there are plenty of people in the market who give good reviews, and many of them even take money for positive reviews to attract investors to their products. If you're thinking of using it, I suggest starting with a small capital to minimize your risk. Personally, I wouldn't recommend using it unless you have a solid understanding of how the future trade market operates.

comments.author: TravelMug
comments.body: I don't know, it sounds to be a shill to me.In any case though, trading bots could be 50/50 for all we know. Way back there are a lot of trading bots here and it seems some of them are legit and some not so. And I was really surprised that still some projects are still selling it right now when I thought that the market has been saturated already with trading bots. So I don't like the burst the bubble to the OP, but I guess it's kinda late, just saying.

comments.author: aseprebel
comments.body: Quote from: George055 on September 10, 2023, 10:41:41 AMI was just heard that an upcoming DingDang bubble project is launching it's Future Trading bot available on Discord and Telegram, you have the capability to go long or short on any on-chain assets as Futures trading is all about betting against the pricing, this is why Bubble Futures Bot will use Chain Link price oracle on Ethereum Chain to fetch real-time prices from centralized and decentralized trading platforms.So i also heard about other bots like unibot following the same practice and people are taking good profit from them so i want to ask from some experts should i have to take part in the ding dang project and used their bot for trading because projects like this are always gives profit according to my DYOR.website link are given belowWeb: https://dingdang.io/ In my opinion trading bots can be worth it for some traders, particularly those with a strong understanding of trading strategies and the technical skills required to configure and monitor them effectively. However, they are not a guaranteed path to success, and there are risks involved. It's essential to thoroughly research and test any trading bot you plan to use and consider how it fits into your overall trading strategy.

comments.author: ryzaadit
comments.body: People who are using (trading-bot) and believe passive income, got ending the same think and the cycle always:- You gain a small profit- Keep using the bot- Finally the gain % become lose %- You ended blow up your money + need to pay for bot serviceNever using bot trading, unless you know how to make it by your self. That's mean, you have fully knowledged and understand fully about the about by your self not by other service.
